text: Seong Hon (June 25, 1535 – June 6, 1598) was a Neo-Confucian scholar, politician, and soldier of the Joseon Dynasty. He was a leader of the West Man party. His pen names were Ugye (우계, 牛溪) and Mukam (묵암, 默巖). == Works == * Ugaejip (우계집, 牛溪集) * Jumunjigyeol (주문지결, 朱門旨訣) * Uihakjibang (위학지방, 爲學之方) == Related pages == * Yi I * Song Ikpil * Kim Jang-saeng == Other websites == * Seong Hon * Seong Hon:Korean historical person information Category:1535 births Category:1598 deaths Category:Korean educators Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean autobiographers
title: Seong Hon
